title: Wayward Compass
effect: Shows the Knight’s current position on the map.

title: Gathering Swarm
summary: A helpful cloud of bugs follows you.
effect: Automatically collects dropped Geo nearby.

title: Stalwart Shell
effect: Increases invulnerability time after taking damage and reduces knockback recovery.

title: Soul Catcher
summary: Draw a little more power from foes.
effect: Gain extra SOUL with each Nail hit.

title: Shaman Stone
effect: Increases spell damage and slightly enlarges projectiles.

title: Soul Eater
effect: Greatly increases SOUL gained from Nail hits.

title: Dashmaster
effect: Reduces dash cooldown and enables a downward ground dash.

title: Grubsong
effect: Gain a bit of SOUL when taking damage.

title: Grubberfly's Elegy
effect: At full health, Nail swings fire long-range energy slashes.

title: Fragile Heart
effect: Increases max health, but the charm breaks upon death.

title: Fragile Greed
effect: Increases Geo gained from defeated enemies, but the charm breaks upon death.

title: Fragile Strength
effect: Increases Nail damage, but the charm breaks upon death.

title: Spell Twister
effect: Reduces SOUL cost of spells.

title: Steady Body
effect: Prevents backward recoil from Nail swings.

title: Heavy Blow
effect: Increases knockback on enemies with Nail strikes.

title: Quick Slash
effect: Greatly increases Nail swing speed.

title: Longnail
effect: Modestly increases Nail attack range.

title: Mark of Pride
effect: Significantly increases Nail attack range.

title: Fury of the Fallen
effect: Greatly increases Nail damage when at 1 mask of health.

title: Thorns of Agony
effect: Releases damaging vines when the Knight takes damage.

title: Baldur Shell
effect: Creates a protective shell while focusing SOUL; absorbs a limited amount of hits.

title: Flukenest
effect: Vengeful Spirit/Shade Soul become swarms of flukes with wide spread.

title: Defender's Crest
effect: Emits a damaging toxic cloud around the Knight; alters certain charm interactions.

title: Glowing Womb
effect: Spends SOUL to spawn hatchlings that seek and damage enemies.

title: Quick Focus
effect: Greatly increases the speed of SOUL focusing (healing).

title: Deep Focus
effect: Focus heals two masks at once but much more slowly.

title: Lifeblood Heart
effect: Grants a few temporary Lifeblood masks when resting; cannot be healed normally.

title: Lifeblood Core
effect: Grants several temporary Lifeblood masks when resting; cannot be healed normally.

title: Joni's Blessing
effect: Converts all masks to Lifeblood and increases max amount; healing becomes impossible.

title: Hiveblood
effect: Slowly regenerates the last mask of damage taken if you avoid further harm for a short time.

title: Spore Shroom
effect: Releases a lingering spore cloud when focusing SOUL that damages nearby foes.

title: Sharp Shadow
effect: Shadow dash travels farther and damages enemies you dash through.

title: Shape of Unn
effect: Allows crawling movement while focusing; shrinks the Knight’s profile during the heal.

title: Nailmaster's Glory
effect: Greatly reduces charge time for Nail Arts.

title: Dream Wielder
effect: Speeds up Dream Nail charge and yields more Essence from spirits.

title: Kingsoul
summary: A living core of Pale power.
effect: Slowly generates SOUL over time and opens a path to a deeper truth; later transforms into Void Heart.

title: Void Heart
effect: Binds the Void to the Knight; alters world interactions and endings. Replaces Kingsoul and has no notch cost.

title: Unbreakable Heart
effect: Permanent version of Fragile Heart: increases max health and no longer breaks on death.

title: Unbreakable Greed
effect: Permanent version of Fragile Greed: increases Geo gain and no longer breaks on death.

title: Unbreakable Strength
effect: Permanent version of Fragile Strength: increases Nail damage and no longer breaks on death.

title: Dreamshield
effect: Summons a rotating shield that blocks some projectiles and damages on contact.

title: Weaversong
effect: Summons Weaverlings that skitter and attack nearby enemies.

title: Sprintmaster
effect: Increases the Knight’s horizontal movement speed.

title: Carefree Melody
effect: Grants a chance to negate incoming damage entirely.

title: Grimmchild
effect: A familiar follows and shoots fireballs; grows stronger as flames are gathered.
